rules.expression: windows_container_network_receive_bytes_total{job = "windows-exporter", cluster = "$cluster"} * on(container_id) group_left(container, pod, namespace, cluster) max(kube_pod_container_info{job = "kube-state-metrics", cluster = "$cluster"}) by(container, container_id, pod, namespace, cluster)
sort_desc(sum by (cluster, namespace, pod, container) (rate(windows_container_network_received_bytes_total{job = "windows-exporter", cluster = "$cluster"}[3m])))

windows_container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job = "windows-exporter", cluster = "$cluster"} * on(container_id) group_left(container, pod, namespace, cluster) max(kube_pod_container_info{job = "kube-state-metrics", cluster = "$cluster"}) by(container, container_id, pod, namespace, cluster)
sort_desc(sum by (cluster, namespace, pod, container) (rate(windows_container_network_transmitted_bytes_total{job = "windows-exporter", cluster = "$cluster"}[3m])))
